\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 34133}

\subsection*{A Very Nice Recreational Drug}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Sin}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & insufflated & Pharms - Trazodone & ground / crushed\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 150.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I just wanted to say that Trazodone can be used as a nice recreational drug. A bunch of my friends and I always love to take trazis but we don't swallow them, we insufflate them. They're a bit harsh but sort of sweet as well. They mix very well with a few beers or a little to drink\ldots very nice sedative feeling\ldots relaxation. No adverse side-effects for me.

\end{document}
